summary: When two friends tape-recorded the fights of their violently noisy neighbors, they accidentally created one of the world's first 'viral' pop-culture sensations.
cast: Eddie Lee Sausage|Mitch Deprey|Daniel Clowes|Ivan Brunetti|Mike Mitchell|Robert Mothersbaugh|Ursula Mothersbaugh|Henry S. Rosenthal|Tony Newton|Mark Gunderson|Christy Brand|Gregg Gibbs|David Stein|Dan Augustine|Doug Levy|Patrick Frost|Doug Wiggins|David Riessen|Orson Welles|Devo|Christian Bale|George Cothran|Peter Haskett|Raymond Huffman|Gill Gayle|Adolf Hitler|Glenn Shadix
keywords: artist|noisy neighbor|rotary phone|two men dancing|reference to evel knievel
title: Shut Up Little Man! An Audio Misadventure
